name: US Soldier Shoot Monster
description:
Save Your town form the Dangerous Monsters,They Gonna attack your valley ,save your Valley.
Monster Killing requires advanced skills and safety awareness.
Prepare to experience the thrilling adventure in the middle of town,
Its Your Responsibility to Safe your town from these Monsters
You Have the Sniper Gun to Aim and shoot these monster,
Take the most strategic vantage point for that perfect aim.

Features:
- Option of taking aim through sniper lens for smart hunting
- HD Graphics
- 3D Monster
- High Quality sound
- Simple and easy Game play controls
- Its all Free
